channel.title: Computer question
channel.description: My friend, who was not very good at coding, only building computers, before he moved, he had told me about a prank he liked to play on people, all he needed was their ip and he could pop thier cd door open. he did it to me so i know it worked, does anyone know how he did this? all i know was he got their ip from counter strike and midgame he did it to distract his opponent.

item.title: Computer question
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

Radmin would allow you to get onto their comp,moving the mouse,running programs and etc. but both users have to agree with that.

Read full topic

item.title: Computer question
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Hiaburi:

lol no he didn’t do it like that, he had something that he entered their ip in then entered in sum hex code or sumthin and poped their cd drive

We are correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Computer question
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Think of IP’s as addresses and firewalls as locked doors, if they have a firewall you got no chance of getting in without being caught, if they have a trojan or a backdoor virus, then they can sneak in and out, same with no firewall.

Of course, routers have firewalls too.

Read full topic

item.title: Computer question
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

It’d be a back door like sub7 or Netbus that he got onto their machines one way or another (most people would trick a user to run the install for one of the aforementioned programs - this is known as ‘social engineering’).

Read full topic

item.title: Computer question
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

yea u can with their pc, ive done it b4, long ago, but i dont remember how, and i never knew how to pop cd drive. I took a class were the teacher taught us how to take control of sum1s pc with just thier ip and sum modding on ur own pc. and my freind never touched my pc, and we never traded files so there was no way he put nething on my pc when he did it to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Computer question

item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

That doesn’t happen sorry. You can’t control someones computer with JUST their IP. Maybe with programs like sub7 and stuff but no.
